item.title: 花旗称俄乌局势缓和 石油风险降至 50 美元
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.高级商品策略师 Eric Lee 认为。【原文：A de-escalation of Russia’s war in Ukraine threatens to push oil prices toward $50 a barrel, according to Citigroup Inc. Senior Commodities Strategist Eric Lee.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉资本探讨收购 Clear Channel Outdoor
item.description: 据知情人士透露，穆巴达拉资本公司（Mubadala Capital）正在探索收购 Clear Channel Outdoor Holdings Inc.【原文：Mubadala Capital is exploring an acquisition of Clear Channel Outdoor Holdings Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 自上次停摆以来联邦工人申请失业救济的人数最多
item.description: 美国劳工部的最新数据显示，自上次政府关门以来，美国联邦政府工作人员申请失业救济的人数最多。【原文：US federal workers filed the most applications for unemployment benefits since the last government shutdown, according to the latest Labor Department data.】

item.title: 贸易战升级，全球金融首脑呼吁保持冷静
item.description: 本周，来自世界各地的财政首脑结束了会谈，他们对贸易紧张局势、地缘政治不信任以及美国主导的人工智能热潮所带来的欣喜都给全球经济带来了日益根深蒂固的风险这一现实感到无奈。【原文：Finance chiefs from around the world wrapped up talks this week resigned to the reality that trade tensions, geopolitical mistrust and the euphoria over the US-led boom in artificial intelligence all pose increasingly entrenched risks to the global economy.】

item.title: Wunsch 表示，欧洲央行可以接受与 2% 目标的有限偏离
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员皮埃尔-旺施（Pierre Wunsch）表示，欧洲中央银行不应对偏离其 2% 通胀目标的微小偏差做出反应，尤其是当这些偏差是由货币政策无能为力的因素造成时。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t react to small deviations from its 2% inflation goal, especially when they’re due to factors that monetary policy can do little about, Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch said.】

item.title: 麦克莱姆认为加拿大劳动力市场 "疲软"，尽管九月份有所增长
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）表示，他认为加拿大劳动力市场 "疲软"，尽管最近的数据显示加拿大 9 月份新增了 6.04 万个就业岗位。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem said he sees the Canadian labor market as “soft” despite recent data that showed the country added 60,400 jobs in September.】

item.title: 南非艰难的二十国集团债务宣言招致批评
item.description: 以南非为首的 20 国集团财政负责人在华盛顿就解决日益严重的主权债务危机达成了最后一刻宣言，但活动家们对此却不以为然，认为该宣言过于怯懦，难以发挥作用。【原文：Activists dismissed a last-minute declaration agreed by Group of 20 finance chiefs led by South Africa in Washington on tackling the growing sovereign-debt crisis as too timid to make a difference.】

item.title: 贝森特表示将于下周在马来西亚会见中国国家主席习近平
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他将于今晚与中国副总理何立峰通话，然后可能于一周后在马来西亚举行面对面会谈。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he will speak with his Chinese counterpart, Vice Premier He Lifeng this evening, ahead of a likely in-person meeting in Malaysia in a week.】

item.title: DRW 的威尔逊抨击交易所在加密货币暴跌期间的做法
item.description: 在上周加密货币市场崩溃期间，芝加哥自营交易大户 DRW 控股有限责任公司（DRW Holdings LLC）创始人唐纳德-威尔逊（Donald R. Wilson）批评了数字资产交易所的做法。【原文：Donald R. Wilson, founder of Chicago-based proprietary trading powerhouse DRW Holdings LLC, criticized the practices of digital asset exchanges during last week’s crypto market meltdown, where cascading liquidations led to record losses.】

item.title: 圣弗朗西斯科联储主席玛丽-戴利的阿拉斯加之旅
item.description:
地区联储主席在路上的所见所闻。【原文：

What a regional Fed president hears on the road.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩敦促联合资助欧洲国防开支
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）说，如果欧洲真的想提高欧元的国际地位，就必须在安全和经济方面变得更加强大和更具活力。【原文：Europe must become stronger and more dynamic both in security and economically if it really wants to raise the euro’s international status, European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn said.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚寻求通过限制现货市场销售削减能源开支
item.description: 哥伦比亚政府颁布了一项法令，旨在迫使水电站通过长期合同而不是立即交付的方式出售更多能源，以降低家庭成本。【原文：Colombia’s government issued a decree that seeks to force hydropower plants to sell more energy through longer-term contracts rather than for immediate delivery, in a bid to lower costs to households.】

item.title: 次级贷款公司 PrimaLend 的未偿债权人寻求破产
item.description: PrimaLend 公司向汽车经销商提供融资，以满足次级贷款者的需求，该公司的债权人在数月未获偿付后，正在权衡将该公司推向破产的可能性。【原文：Creditors of PrimaLend, which provides financing to auto dealerships that cater to subprime borrowers, are weighing pushing the firm into bankruptcy after going unpaid for months, and as the industry reels from the recent downfall of Tricolor Holdings.】

item.title: 雷切尔-里夫斯暗示将在预算案中提高英国的财政缓冲能力
item.description: 蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）发出了迄今为止最明确的信号，即她将在下个月公布英国年度预算时提高其微薄的财政缓冲。【原文：Rachel Reeves gave her clearest signal yet that she will boost her wafer-thin fiscal buffer when she delivers the UK’s annual budget next month.】

item.title: VikingGPT "帮助对冲基金巨头研究交易理念
item.description: 维京全球投资公司（Viking Global Investors）推出最新的内部人工智能聊天机器人后，交易员和交易商们立即投入了工作。【原文：When Viking Global Investors rolled out its latest in-house artificial intelligence chatbot, traders and dealmakers wasted no time putting it to work.】

item.title: 纽约市亚当斯考虑堆叠租房委员会，危及马姆达尼优先权
item.description: 纽约市长埃里克-亚当斯（Eric Adams）正在考虑一系列任命，这些任命可能会阻止市长候选人佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）的部分议程。【原文：New York Mayor Eric Adams is considering a slate of appointments that could wield the power to block parts of mayoral front-runner Zohran Mamdani’s agenda.】

item.title: 贵金属反弹后回落，白银跌幅超过 6
item.description: 白银跌幅超过 6%，创六个月来最大跌幅，贵金属大类在本周大幅反弹后出现回调。【原文：Silver fell more than 6% in its biggest drop in six months as the broad precious metals group retreated following a furious rally this week.】

item.title: 交叉代码》制作人期待跟进独立杰作
item.description: Alabaster Dawn》将以《CrossCode》中的战斗和谜题为基础，但会呈现一个全新的环境【原文：'Alabaster Dawn' will build on the combat and puzzles of 'CrossCode' but present an entirely new setting】

item.title: 俄罗斯称化工厂爆炸至少造成八人受伤
item.description: 据当地政府称，俄罗斯巴什科尔托斯坦共和国的一处生产设施发生爆炸，造成严重破坏，至少八人受伤。【原文：An explosion seriously damaged a production facility in Russia’s Bashkortostan republic, leaving at least eight people injured, according to local authorities.】

item.title: 乌克兰在新贷款谈判前面临国际货币基金组织贬值压力
item.description: 乌克兰中央银行正受到国际货币基金组织的压力，要求将这个饱受战争摧残的国家的货币贬值，这一提议有可能在新贷款方案的关键谈判之前引发基辅的紧张局势。【原文：Ukraine’s central bank is coming under pressure from the International Monetary Fund to devalue the war-battered nation’s currency, a proposal that risks triggering tension in Kyiv ahead of crucial talks on a new loan package.】

item.title: 美联储主席穆萨莱姆表示可能支持再次降息，但政策并未预设
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆表示，他可以支持再次降息，以刺激放缓的劳动力市场，但他强调，鉴于经济的不确定性，官员们应该逐次会议做出决定。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said he could support another interest-rate reduction to bolster a slowing labor market, but emphasized officials should make decisions meeting by meeting given economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 黄金矿商涨势乏力，涨幅超过金属涨幅
item.description: 几个月来，黄金的涨势令华尔街惊叹不已。黄金矿商的表现甚至更好，以至于投资者现在开始质疑纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp.）、阿尼科-伊格尔矿业公司（Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd.）及其竞争对手的股票的历史性涨幅是否过高。【原文：Gold’s rally has awed Wall Street for months. Gold miners have done even better - so well that investors are now asking whether historic gains in shares of Newmont Corp., Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd. and their competitors have gone too far.】

item.title: 纽文垃圾债券基金削减 99% 的芝加哥学校债务
item.description: Nuveen 出售了主要持有的芝加哥现金拮据的学区债券，退出了持有近十年的债务头寸。【原文：Nuveen has sold major holdings of Chicago’s cash-strapped school district bonds, trading out of debt positions it has held for close to a decade.】

item.title: 保时捷新任首席执行官是一位擅长混合动力的豪华车领导者
item.description: 保时捷公司任命迈克尔-雷特斯（Michael Leiters）为下一任首席执行官，让这位曾在迈凯轮汽车有限公司（McLaren Automotive Ltd.）和法拉利公司（Ferrari NV）磨练出豪华车技能的德国工程师来领导公司扭亏为盈。【原文：Porsche AG named Michael Leiters its next chief executive officer, tapping a German engineer who has honed his luxury-car skills at McLaren Automotive Ltd. and Ferrari NV to steer a turnaround.】

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所老板称，英国养老金需要投资本地股票的理由
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团（London Stock Exchange Group Plc）的老板表示，英国养老基金需要更多的激励措施来持有英国股票。【原文：British pension funds need more incentives to hold UK equities, according to the boss of the London Stock Exchange Group Plc.】

item.title: 基金因债务交易变质在英国起诉内衣公司和受托人
item.description: 三家投资基金正在起诉荷兰内衣零售商亨克莫勒国际公司（Hunkemöller International BV）及其债务受托人，声称基金红木资本管理公司（Redwood Capital Management）接管该公司的交易侵犯了他们的债权人权利。【原文：A trio of investment funds are suing Dutch lingerie retailer Hunkemöller International BV and the trustee of its debt over claims that a transaction which saw fund Redwood Capital Management take over the company violated their creditor rights.】

item.title: 英国广播公司（BOE）的格林称工人的议价能力正在减弱
item.description: 英格兰银行利率制定者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）表示，工人们将更无力提高工资来弥补通胀的新一轮飙升。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Megan Greene said workers will be less able to boost their wages to compensate for a fresh spike in inflation.】

item.title: 中国 MMG 发现秘鲁非正规挖掘者造成的铜矿损失不断增加
item.description: 中资矿业公司MMG Ltd.提高了对其秘鲁特许矿区内因非正规挖掘而损失的铜矿量的估算，该矿区被指定为其下一个露天矿坑。【原文：Chinese-owned mining company MMG Ltd. has raised an estimate for the amount of copper lost to informal digging in an area of its Peruvian concession earmarked as its next open pit.】

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行首席执行官就主街的困境发出警告
item.description: 还有：蒙特利尔银行和道明银行的人事变动【原文：Also: People moves at BMO and TD】

item.title: 象牙海岸出口商因可可豆质量低劣而拒收可可豆
item.description: 由于霉菌和大量废料的存在，出口商拒绝接受运抵象牙海岸港口的大部分可可豆，在市场预期供应过剩的情况下，可可豆的供应情况却变得扑朔迷离。【原文：Exporters are rejecting the bulk of cocoa beans arriving at Ivory Coast ports because of mold and a high volume of waste material, muddying the supply picture when the market is expecting a surplus.】
